article.title: Lockheed to Support Certified Round Data Management System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Grand Prairie, Texas, was awarded a nearly $26 million contract for the technical and consumable material support, as well as planning, management, technical and logistical support to all test, failure analysis, quality reliability assessment and maintenance of the Certified Round Data Management System and maintenance support activities conducted at the Missile Maintenance Facility.Â The U.S. Army Aviation & Missile Command, Contracting Center, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
